JSON_SETTINGS.query:
| paramdefaults 
	category =  "none"
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
	chart_type=area
| meta name="data" 
| source eavstats 
	category =  param(category, "none")
	entity = "users.active"
	attributes = {
		type: "USR"
	}
	detailed=true

| crates
	name=TIMECRATE
	by=TIME 
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| sort TIME # sort here to make sure fields()-function gets all existing fields

| stats 
	by= [TIMECRATE, scenario]
	COUNT=SUM(ceil(AVG))
| chart 
	by = [scenario]
	type = param(chart_type)
	x=TIMECRATE
	y=COUNT
	pointradius=1
	stacked=true

| paramdefaults 
	category =  "none"
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
	chart_type=area
| meta name="data" 
| source eavstats 
	category = param(category, "none")
	entity = "%"
	attributes = {
		status: "ok"
	  , type: "REQ"
	}
	detailed=true
| rename ENTITY = REQUEST
| crates
	name=TIMECRATE
	by=TIME 
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| sort TIME # sort here to make sure fields()-function gets all existing fields

| stats 
	by= [TIMECRATE]
	MIN=MIN(MIN)
	AVG=AVG(AVG)
	MAX=MAX(MAX)
	"P95"=PERC("P95", 95)
| chart 
	x=TIMECRATE
	y=[MIN,AVG,"P95",MAX]
	type=param(chart_type)
	pointradius=1

| paramdefaults 
	category =  "none"
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
	chart_type=area
| meta name="data" 
| source eavstats 
	category =  param(category, "none")
	entity = "%"
	attributes = {
	    type: "REQ"
	}
	detailed=true
| rename ENTITY = REQUEST
| crates
	name=TIMECRATE
	by=TIME 
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| stats 
	by= [TIMECRATE, status]
	COUNT=SUM(COUNT)
| chart 
	by= [status]
	x=TIMECRATE
	y=COUNT
	type= param(chart_type)
	pointradius=2
	settings = tojson(param("chart_settings", {}))

| paramdefaults 
	category =  "none"
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
	chart_type=area
| meta name="data" 
| source eavstats 
	category =  param(category, "none")
	entity = "users.total_started"
	attributes = {
		type: "USR"
	}
	detailed=true

| crates
	name=TIMECRATE
	by=TIME 
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| sort TIME # sort here to make sure fields()-function gets all existing fields

| stats 
	by= [TIMECRATE, scenario]
	COUNT=SUM(ceil(AVG))
| chart 
	by = [scenario]
	type = param(chart_type)
	x=TIMECRATE
	y=COUNT
	pointradius=1
	stacked=true
	showaxes=false
	showlegend=false

| paramdefaults 
	category =  "none"
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
	chart_type=area
| meta name="data" 
| source eavstats 
	category =  param(category, "none")
	entity = "users.total_stopped"
	attributes = {
		type: "USR"
	}
	detailed=true

| crates
	name=TIMECRATE
	by=TIME 
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| sort TIME # sort here to make sure fields()-function gets all existing fields

| stats 
	by= [TIMECRATE, scenario]
	COUNT=SUM(ceil(AVG))
| chart 
	by = [scenario]
	type = param(chart_type)
	x=TIMECRATE
	y=COUNT
	pointradius=1
	stacked=true
	showaxes=false
	showlegend=false

| paramdefaults 
	category =  "none"
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
	chart_settings={}
| global
	sparkheight="75px"
	sparkwidth="17vw"
| source eavstats 
	category = param(category, "none")
	entity = "%"
	detailed=true
| filter 
	type != "USR"
| rename ENTITY = metric
| crates
	name=timegroup
	by=TIME 
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| sort TIME # sort here to make sure fields()-function gets all existing fields

| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[timegroup, metric] 
	OK_COUNT = sumif(COUNT, (status == "ok"))
	KO_COUNT = sumif(COUNT, (status == "ko"))
	MIN=MIN(MIN)
	AVG=AVG(AVG)
	MAX=MAX(MAX)
	"P50"=PERC("P50", 50)
	"P95"=PERC("P95", 95)
| stats # now make statistics by request and create groups for charts
	by=[metric] 
	OK_COUNT = sum(OK_COUNT)
	KO_COUNT = sumif(KO_COUNT)
	MIN=MIN(MIN)
	AVG=AVG(AVG)
	MAX=MAX(MAX)
	"P50"=PERC("P50", 50)
	"P95"=PERC("P95", 95)
	"counts" = records()
	"metrics" = records()
| formatfield
	request=[
			  ['css', "max-width", "20vw"]
			 ,['css', "text-wrap", "wrap"]
			 ,['css', "word-wrap", "break-word"]
		]
			
	fields(request, "counts", "metrics")=['align', "right"]
	
	AVG=['decimals', 1]
	
| formatchart 
	fields=["counts"] 	
	y=["OK_COUNT", "KO_COUNT"]	
	x=timegroup 
	type=param(chart_type) 
	height=globals("sparkheight") 
	width=globals("sparkwidth") 
	pointradius=1 
	stacked=true
	showlegend=false
	showaxes=false
| formatchart 
	fields=["metrics"] 
	by=[]
	y=["MIN", "AVG", "P95", "MAX"]	
	x=timegroup 
	type=param(chart_type) 
	height=globals("sparkheight") 
	width=globals("sparkwidth") 
	pointradius=1
	showlegend=false
	showaxes=false
| display 
	as=table 
	sizes = [10, 25, 50, 100]
	defaultsize=10

widgets.TITLE: Statistics As CSV (Double Click to Select All)

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
| paramdefaults 
	category =  "none"
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
| source eavstats 
	category = param(category, "none")
	entity = "%"
	attributes = {
		type: "REQ"
	}
	detailed=true
| rename ENTITY = METRIC
| stats # now make statistics by request and create groups for charts
	by=[METRIC] 
	OK_COUNT = sumif(COUNT, (status == "ok"))
	KO_COUNT = sumif(COUNT, (status == "ko"))
	MIN=MIN(MIN)
	AVG=AVG(AVG)
	MAX=MAX(MAX)
	"P50"=PERC("P50", 50)
	"P95"=PERC("P95", 95)
| display as=csv menu=false

widgets.TITLE: Statistics As JSON (Double Click to Select All)

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
| paramdefaults 
	category =  "none"
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
| source eavstats 
	category = param(category, "none")
	entity = "%"
	attributes = {
		type: "REQ"
	}
	detailed=true
| rename ENTITY = METRIC
| stats # now make statistics by request and create groups for charts
	by=[METRIC] 
	OK_COUNT = sumif(COUNT, (status == "ok"))
	KO_COUNT = sumif(COUNT, (status == "ko"))
	MIN=MIN(MIN)
	AVG=AVG(AVG)
	MAX=MAX(MAX)
	"P50"=PERC("P50", 50)
	"P95"=PERC("P95", 95)
| display as=json menu=false

widgets.TITLE: Statistics As XML(Double Click to Select All)

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
| paramdefaults 
	category =  "none"
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
| source eavstats 
	category = param(category, "none")
	entity = "%"
	attributes = {
		type: "REQ"
	}
	detailed=true
| rename ENTITY = METRIC
| stats # now make statistics by request and create groups for charts
	by=[METRIC] 
	OK_COUNT = sumif(COUNT, (status == "ok"))
	KO_COUNT = sumif(COUNT, (status == "ko"))
	MIN=MIN(MIN)
	AVG=AVG(AVG)
	MAX=MAX(MAX)
	"P50"=PERC("P50", 50)
	"P95"=PERC("P95", 95)
| display as=xml menu=false

| paramdefaults 
	category =  "none"
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
	chart_settings={}
| source eavstats 
	category = param(category, "none")
	entity = "%"
	attributes={
		type: "REQ"
	}
	detailed=true
| rename ENTITY = metric

| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[metric] 
	"FROM"	=min(TIME)
	"TO"	=max(TIME)
| chart 
	by=[metric] 
	type='gantt'
	x=FROM # start time in epoch milliseconds
	y=TO   # end time in epoch milliseconds
	showaxes=false

| paramdefaults 
	category =  "none"
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
	chart_type=area
| global
	sparkheight="75px"
	sparkwidth="17vw"
| meta name="data"
| source eavstats 
	category = param(category, "none")
	entity = "%"
	attributes = {
		type = "REQ"
	}
	detailed=true
| rename ENTITY = REQUEST
;
#####################################
# MIN
| resultcopy 	"data"
| meta 			name = "MIN"
| percentiles   PERC = meta(name)
| set 			PERC = ceil(PERC)
| stats			by=[PERC] meta(name) = AVG( "MIN" )
| keep PERC, meta(name)
;
#####################################
# AVG
| resultcopy 	"data"
| meta 			name = "AVG"
| percentiles   PERC = meta(name)
| set 			PERC = ceil(PERC)
| stats			by=[PERC] meta(name) = AVG( "AVG" )
| keep PERC, meta(name)
;
#####################################
# P95
| resultcopy 	"data"
| meta 			name = "P95"
| percentiles   PERC = meta(name)
| set 			PERC = ceil(PERC)
| stats			by=[PERC] meta(name) = AVG( "P95" )
| keep PERC, meta(name)
;
#####################################
# MAX
| resultcopy 	"data"
| meta 			name = "MAX"
| percentiles   PERC = meta(name)
| set 			PERC = ceil(PERC)
| stats			by=[PERC] meta(name) = AVG( "MAX" )
| keep PERC, meta(name)
;


#####################################
# Join
| meta name = "INDEX"
| source empty records = 100
| set PERC = count() + 1
;
| resultjoin on=PERC join="right" # join MIN
;
| resultjoin on=PERC join="right"  # join AVG
;
| resultjoin on=PERC join="right"  # join P95
;
| resultjoin on=PERC join="right"  # join MAX
| resultremove "data"
| rename PERC = Percentile
| chart 
	y=["MIN", "AVG", "P95", "MAX"]	
	x=Percentile
	pointradius=2
	spangaps=true
	xtype=linear
	xlabel = "Percentile"
	ylabel = "Response Time"

JSON_SETTINGS.description: Compare the data selected with this time range picker (A), to the data shown above, selected with the dashboards time range picker (B). Preferably this time range you choose here should be earlier than the one selected for the dashboard. Thresholds are in percentages.

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
| paramdefaults
	category = "none"
	compare_to = object(
					 'earliest', earliest()
					,'latest', latest()
				)
| meta
	'timerange' = tojson(param('compare_to'))
| source eavstats 
	category = param(category, "none")
	entity = "%"
	attributes = {
		type: "REQ"
	}
	detailed=true
	earliest=meta('timerange').earliest
	latest=meta('timerange').latest
| rename ENTITY = metric
| stats # now make statistics by request and create groups for charts
	by=[metric] 
	OK_COUNT = sumif(COUNT, (status == "ok"))
	KO_COUNT = sumif(COUNT, (status == "ko"))
	MIN=MIN(MIN)
	AVG=AVG(AVG)
	MAX=MAX(MAX)
	"P50"=PERC("P50", 50)
	"P95"=PERC("P95", 95)
;
| meta
	timerange = object(
				   'earliest', earliest()
				 , 'latest', latest()
				)
| mimic
;
| resultcompare
	by=[metric]
	percentformat = [['percent', $threshold_good$, $threshold_bad$, "bg", "cfw-gray"], [align, right]]
| formatfield
	request=[
			  ['css', "max-width", "20vw"]
			 ,['css', "text-wrap", "wrap"]
			 ,['css', "word-wrap", "break-word"]
		]
	fields(metric, "counts", "metrics")=['align', "right"]
	[mean, stdev]=['decimals', 1]
| display 
	as=table
	download=true

parameters.LABEL: Query Select
parameters.NAME: category
parameters.VALUE:
| source appdb
	query=`
	SELECT DISTINCT CATEGORY FROM CFW_EAV_ENTITY
	`
| sort CATEGORY
